================================================================================
BUSINESS IDENTITY
================================================================================

Business Name: Sky Growers
Legal Name: Sky Growers
Business Type: Family-Owned Regenerative Farm
Industry: Agriculture, Fresh Produce, Vegetable Farming
Founded: 2023
Founder: Upkar Singh Bhatti
Ownership: Family-Owned and Operated

================================================================================
LOCATION & SERVICE AREA
================================================================================

Physical Location:
- City: Christchurch
- Region: Canterbury
- Country: New Zealand
- Geographic Zone: South Island

Service Area Coverage:
- Primary: Christchurch Central, Merivale, Riccarton, Fendalton
- Extended: Canterbury Region, North Canterbury, South Canterbury
- Delivery: Same-day and next-day available in Christchurch metro

================================================================================
CONTACT INFORMATION
================================================================================

Phone: +64 27 730 0400
WhatsApp: +64 27 730 0400
Website: https://skygrowers.com
Business Hours: Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (New Zealand Standard Time)

================================================================================
PRODUCTS - FRESH VEGETABLES
================================================================================

Year-Round Availability:
1. Fresh Coriander (Cilantro) - Aromatic herb, essential for Asian and Latin cuisines
2. Pumpkin - New Zealand grown, perfect for soups and roasting
3. Butternut Squash - Sweet, nutty flavor, versatile cooking vegetable
4. Crisp Radish - Fresh, peppery root vegetable
5. Cucumber - Crisp salad vegetable, locally grown
6. Spring Onion - Mild onion flavor, green stalks
7. Spinach - Nutrient-dense leafy green
8. Beetroot - Earthy root vegetable, great for salads
9. Leafy Greens - Mixed varieties including silverbeet, kale, rocket
10. Microgreens - Nutrient-packed baby greens
11. Fresh Herbs - Parsley, mint, basil, and seasonal varieties

Quality Standards:
- Sustainably grown using regenerative agriculture practices
- Pesticide-free, natural pest control methods
- Hand-picked at peak freshness
- GAP (Good Agricultural Practices) certified
- Food Safety Modernization Act compliant

================================================================================
SERVICES
================================================================================

1. WHOLESALE SUPPLY
   - Restaurant and cafe vegetable supply
   - Bulk pricing for commercial kitchens
   - Regular delivery schedules
   - Custom order fulfillment

2. HORECA (Hotels, Restaurants, Cafes)
   - Dedicated hospitality supply program
   - Volume discounts
   - Priority delivery scheduling
   - Quality consistency guarantee

3. GROCERY & RETAIL
   - Supermarket supply partnerships
   - Retail packaging options
   - Consistent supply chain

4. DIRECT TO CONSUMER
   - Farm-fresh home delivery
   - Weekly subscription boxes
   - Seasonal produce bundles
   - Family-sized portions

5. CATERING SUPPLY
   - Event catering support
   - Large quantity orders
   - Flexible delivery

================================================================================
TARGET CUSTOMERS
================================================================================

Business Customers (B2B):
- Restaurants seeking premium local produce
- Cafes requiring fresh daily supply
- Hotels and resorts
- Catering companies
- Grocery stores and supermarkets
- Food service providers
- Commercial kitchens

Consumer Customers (B2C):
- Health-conscious families
- Home cooks seeking fresh produce
- Subscription box customers
- Local food advocates
- Sustainability-minded consumers

================================================================================
FARMING PHILOSOPHY & PRACTICES
================================================================================

Regenerative Agriculture:
Sky Growers practices regenerative farming that goes beyond sustainability
to actively improve soil health and ecosystem biodiversity.

Core Practices:
1. Natural Pest Control - No synthetic pesticides, using beneficial insects
   and companion planting
2. Composting - On-farm composting for soil enrichment
3. Crop Rotation - Strategic rotation for soil fertility maintenance
4. Water Conservation - Advanced irrigation systems for efficient water use
5. Soil Health - Regular testing and organic amendment programs
6. Biodiversity - Habitat preservation and native plantings
7. Heritage Methods - Traditional farming techniques combined with modern knowledge

Environmental Commitment:
- Carbon-conscious farming practices
- Minimal packaging, eco-friendly options available
- Local supply chain reducing food miles
- Zero synthetic chemical inputs

================================================================================
CERTIFICATIONS & COMPLIANCE
================================================================================

- GAP (Good Agricultural Practices) Certified
- Food Safety Modernization Act Compliant
- Sustainable Agriculture Practices Verified
- Local Health & Safety Compliant

================================================================================
ORDERING PROCESS
================================================================================

How to Order:
1. Website: Fill out order inquiry form at https://skygrowers.com/contact
2. Phone: Call +64 27 730 0400 during business hours
3. WhatsApp: Message +64 27 730 0400 for quick responses

Order Process:
1. Submit inquiry with vegetable requirements
2. Receive custom quote within 24 hours
3. Confirm order and delivery schedule
4. Receive fresh delivery to your location

Delivery Information:
- Free delivery for bulk orders in central Christchurch
- Extended area delivery charges apply
- Same-day delivery available for early orders
- Regular scheduled deliveries for business customers

================================================================================
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
================================================================================

Q: Where is Sky Growers located?
A: Sky Growers is a family farm in Christchurch, Canterbury, New Zealand,
   serving the entire Canterbury region and South Island.

Q: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
A: Yes, we offer competitive wholesale pricing for restaurants, cafes, hotels,
   and grocery stores. Contact us for a custom quote based on your volume needs.

Q: What vegetables are available year-round?
A: We grow coriander, spinach, radish, cucumber, spring onion, pumpkin, and
   butternut year-round using sustainable greenhouse and field farming practices.

Q: Do you deliver?
A: Yes, we offer delivery across Christchurch and Canterbury. Free delivery
   is available for bulk orders in central Christchurch. Extended areas have
   delivery charges.

Q: Are your vegetables organic/pesticide-free?
A: We use regenerative agriculture practices with natural pest control methods.
   Our produce is grown without harmful synthetic pesticides. We focus on
   sustainable practices that are better for the environment and produce quality.

Q: How can I place an order?
A: You can order through our website contact form at skygrowers.com/contact,
   call +64 27 730 0400, or message us on WhatsApp at the same number.

Q: What is the minimum order quantity?
A: We accommodate both small family orders and large commercial orders.
   Contact us to discuss your specific needs.

Q: Do you offer subscription/regular delivery?
A: Yes, we offer weekly vegetable box subscriptions and regular scheduled
   deliveries for business customers.

- Agricultural excellence overview
- Certifications and standards

Contact Page (https://skygrowers.com/contact)
- Order inquiry form
- Phone and WhatsApp contact
- Business hours
- Delivery area information

Terms Page (https://skygrowers.com/terms)
- Terms of service
- Ordering policies
- Delivery terms
- Seasonal availability information
